snippet: Human Rights Watch accused Yemen on Tuesday of failing to investigate the 2011 killing of 45 antigovernment protesters during the uprising against former President Ali Abdullah Saleh.
abstract: Human Rights Watch accuses Yemen of failing to investigate 2011 killing of 45 antigovernment protesters during uprising against former Pres Ali Abdullah Saleh.
lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch accused Yemen on Tuesday of failing to investigate the 2011 killing of 45 antigovernment protesters during the uprising against former President Ali Abdullah Saleh.

headline.main: Group Accuses Yemen of Ignoring Protesters’ Killings
